mapper.update:
update TBL_FINANCE
DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOWN_NAME = #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VILLAGE_NAME = #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_LOAN = #{isLoan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOAN_USE = #{loanUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_JOIN_CREDITRATING = #{isJoinCreditrating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RATING = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_LOAN_GUARANTEE_INSURANCE = #{isLoanGuaranteeInsurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOAN_BANK_NAME = #{loanBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_LOAN = #{totalLoan,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOAN_TIME = #{loanTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNUAL_INTEREST_RATE = #{annualInterestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTACHED_TO_INTEREST = #{attachedToInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTEREST_RATE = #{interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RISK_MONEY = #{riskMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPAY_MONEY = #{repayMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPAY_TIME = #{repayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVERDUE_MONEY = #{overdueMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_TIME = #{overdueTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEAR_ZONE = #{yearZone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
